mapper.select: select a.name as aname, r.name as rname, re.sido || ' ' || re.sigungu as addr, r.price, to_char(to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'MM"월"dd"일"') as startDate, to_char(to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'MM"월"dd"일"') as endDate, to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyyMMdd') - to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyyMMdd') + 1 as totalDate from room r inner join accom a on r.anum = a.anum inner join region re on a.rcode = re.rcode where r.rnum = #{rnum}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (onum, rnum, mnum, resname, resphone, resnum, accnum, bank, startdate, enddate, odate) values (orders_seq.nextval, #{rnum}, #{mnum}, #{resName}, #{resPhone}, 123456, #{accnum}, #{bank}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, sysdate)
mapper.select: with a as( select rnum, sum(orders) orders from ( select r.rnum, case when o.onum is null then 0 else 1 end as orders from room r left outer join ( select * from orders where to_date(startDate, 'yyyyMMdd') <= to_date(${end}, 'yyyyMMdd') and to_date(endDate, 'yyyyMMdd') >= to_date(${start}, 'yyyyMMdd') ) o on r.rnum = o.rnum where anum = ${anum} ) group by rnum, orders ) select a.rnum, a.orders, anum, name, info, price, sale, image, max, reg_date from a inner join room r on a.rnum = r.rnum
